name: Serious Game
description:
You need to fight off all the attacks of monsters. It is possible to pass both in a single mode (the result gets to a rating of players), and network.

- Play alone, with friends or with random players.
- Large assortment of weapons and magic shop.
- A variety of monsters with different powers and abilities. 
- Change of weather conditions and time of day.
- Good music.
- Convenient interface.
- Russian and English languages.
- Ability to compete with other players in the high score table.
